I used the following third party assets:

Unity Asset Store:
- Abdul Rahim: Race Tracks
- AurynSky: Rockets Missiles and Bombs
- Azerilo: HQ Racing Car Model No.1203
- Hedgehog Team: SkyBox Volume 2

OpenGameArt:
- Arkalain: Health Bar

Powerups:
- shield.png by Adeel Anjum (https://icons-for-free.com/firewall+lock+shield+icon-1320165909407344998/)
- repair.png by Joel Avery, GB (https://thenounproject.com/term/screw-driver/206769/)
- laser.png (https://icons8.com/icons/set/laser-beam)
- boost.png by Dev Patel (https://thenounproject.com/term/speed-up/786700/)
